function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased transmission of COVID-19 due to inadequate ventilation and airflow in buildings","Impact":"Higher risk of virus spread and increased infection rates","Mitigation":"Implement innovative technologies to improve ventilation and natural airflow, such as increased fresh air intake and natural ventilation","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, operable windows, natural ventilation systems","People":"Residents, workers, visitors of residential, public, and commercial buildings","Owner":"Building owners, architects, construction companies"},{"Description":"Inadequate construction techniques for emergency buildings (e.g., COVID hospitals, quarantine tents)","Impact":"Slower construction of emergency buildings, higher risk of virus transmission due to delays","Mitigation":"Adopt advancements in construction techniques to speed up the construction of emergency buildings, such as modular structures and adaptive reuse","Technologies":"Modular construction, adaptive reuse, lightweight and adaptive structures","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, emergency responders","Owner":"Construction companies, healthcare facility owners, government agencies"},{"Description":"Conversion of existing buildings into emergency centers raises potential health and safety risks","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and inadequate infrastructure for emergency care","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and use hygienic building materials for quick conversions, ensure sufficient ventilation and airflow in converted buildings","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, hygienic building materials","People":"Emergency responders, patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Building owners, healthcare facility owners, government agencies"}]}
